document.full_text: last january, nazih moussa gerges locked up his downtown cairo law office and joined hundreds of thousands of fellow egyptians to demand that president hosni mubarak step down.
document.title: christians worry egypt being hijacked by islamists
lines_and_colors: last january, nazih moussa gerges locked up his downtown cairo law office and joined hundreds of thousands of fellow egyptians to demand that president hosni mubarak step down.
